abstract: Contact information fields to use for billing and shipping contact information.
overview:
## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentContact/phoneticGivenName] and [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentContact/phoneticFamilyName] fields are available starting in Apple Pay version 3.

items.description: A phone number for the contact.
items.name: phoneNumber

items.description: An email address for the contact.
items.name: emailAddress

items.description: The phonetic spelling of the contact’s given name.
items.name: phoneticGivenName

items.description: The phonetic spelling of the contact’s family name.
items.name: phoneticFamilyName

items.description: The street portion of the address for the contact.
items.name: addressLines

items.description: Additional information associated with the location, typically defined at the city or town level (such as district or neighborhood), in a postal address.
items.name: subLocality

items.description: The zip code or postal code, where applicable, for the contact.
items.name: postalCode

items.description: The subadministrative area (such as a county or other region) in a postal address.
items.name: subAdministrativeArea

items.description: The name of the country or region for the contact.
items.name: country

items.description: The contact’s two-letter ISO 3166 country code.
items.name: countryCode

items.description: Billing contact information for the user.
items.name: billingContact

items.description: Shipping contact information for the user.
items.name: shippingContact

title: ApplePayPaymentContact
